# rrrr_completeness_prover

Completeness theorem prover for R(R)=R 4D lattice: verifies self-referential operator spectra lie within epsilon of lattice

## Installation

```bash
pip install -e .
```

## Usage

```python
from rrrr_completeness_prover import create_rrrr_completeness_prover

instance = create_rrrr_completeness_prover()
instance.run()
```
